scatter_plot_with_groups¶

ucf.scatter_plot_with_groups(coordinates, labels, legend_colors, legend_descriptions, save_plot=False, path=None)[source]¶

Plot scatter plot with coloration according to the labels

Parameters

  • coordinates (np.array) -- Coordinates of points.

  • labels (np.array) -- Vector indicating class membership of each point.

  • legend_colors (dict) -- Colors to be utilized for coloration of points.

  • legend_descriptions (dict) -- Labels to be utilized for description in plot legend.

  • save_plot (bool) -- Indication whether to save a plot. Defaults to none

  • path (basestring) -- Path including the file name where to save the plot.

Returns

No explicit return.

Return type

None
